quiz_status_label.description: Quiz status label: Not Started, In Progress, Completed, or Locked

quiz_prerequisites.description: Quizzes that must be completed prior to taking the quiz

quiz_only_registered_users.description: Only authenticated users can take the Quiz - "true" or "false"

quiz_certificate_threshold_percent.description: Score needed to receive a certificate - percentage

quiz_certificate_threshold_decimal.description: Score needed to receive a certificate - decimal number

quiz_retry_repeats.description: Number of Retries Allowed - default "0" for unlimited

quiz_retries_applicable_to.description: Quiz Retries Applicable to: '1'- All users, '2'- Registered only, '3' - Anonymous only

quiz_force_question_complete.description: Quiz Questions required to complete - "true" or "false"

quiz_result_messages.description: Quiz Result Messages display - list loop of "percent"/"text" pairs

quiz_show_average_result.description: Display the average score of all users who took the quiz - "true" or "false"

quiz_show_category_score.description: Display the score achieved for each Question Category - "true" or "false"

quiz_hide_result_points.description: Hide achieved Quiz score on the Result page - "true" or "false"

quiz_hide_correct_questions.description: Hide number of correctly answered Questions on the Result page - "true" or "false"

quiz_hide_result_time.description: Hide Quiz Time on the Result page - "true" or "false"

quiz_disable_answer_mark.description: Correct / Incorrect Answer Marks disabled - "true" or "false"

quiz_question_display_type.description: Quiz questions display type. "single": one questionat a time  or "multiple": all questions at once

quiz_question_display_single_feedback.description: Quiz question feedback display. end = Display results at the end only (default), each = Display results after each submitted answer

quiz_question_display_single_feedback_ba.description: Quiz question feedback button display - empty or "on"

quiz_show_review_question.description: Quiz show review question table - "true" or "false"

quiz_summary_hide.description: Quiz Summary table before submission hidden - "true" or "false"

quiz_skip_question_disabled.description: Quiz Skip question button a disabled - "true" or "false"

quiz_question_show_points.description: Quiz Additional Question Options : Show points - "true" or "false"

quiz_question_show_category.description: Quiz Additional Question Options : Show category - "true" or "false"

quiz_question_hide_numbering.description: Quiz Additional Question Options : Hide Question numbering- "true" or "false"

quiz_question_numbered_answer.description: Quiz Additional Question Options : Numbered answers- "true" or "false"

quiz_question_answer_random.description: Quiz Additional Question Options : Random answers order- "true" or "false"

quiz_custom_fields_activated.description: Quiz Custom fields Form activated - "true" or "false"

quiz_custom_form_position.description: Custom Form position - '0'- On the quiz startpage, '1'- At the end of the quiz (before the quiz result)

quiz_toplist_access.description: Who can apply to Quiz Leaderboard - '1'- All users, '2'- Registered only, '3' - Anonymous only

quiz_toplist_multi_apply.description: Quiz Leaderboard Multiple Applications per user enabled - "true" or "false"

quiz_toplist_re_apply.description: Quiz Leaderboard Re-apply after - in minutes

quiz_toplist_auto_add.description: Quiz Leaderboard Automatic user entry - "true" or "false"

quiz_toplist_display_limit.description: Quiz Leaderboard Number of displayed entries - default '0' for all

quiz_toplist_sort_by.description: Quiz Leaderboard Sort list by - '1'- Best user, '2'- Newest entry, '3' - Oldest entry

quiz_toplist_display_enabled.description: Quiz Leaderboard Display on Quiz results page enabled - "true" or "false"

quiz_toplist_display_position.description: Quiz Leaderboard Display on Quiz results page position - '1'- Below the result text, '2'- In a button

quiz_wrap_open.description: Renders Quiz Wrapper Open tag - needed for quiz to function

quiz_wrap_close.description: Renders Quiz Wrapper Close tag - needed for quiz to function

quiz_show_add_toplist_box.description: Renders Quiz Add to Toplist  Box

quiz_lock_box.description: Renders Quiz Locked Box(already completed the quiz before)

quiz_only_registered_box.description: Renders Quiz Only Registered User Box

quiz_toplist_in_button_box.description: Renders Quiz In Button position Box

quiz_step_number_course.description: Quiz Step Number relative to Course

quiz_step_number_lesson.description: Quiz Step Number relative to parent Lesson

quiz_step_number_topic.description: Quiz Step Number relative to parent Topic

course.description: Course ID or "current" for current course

lesson.description: Lesson ID or "current" for current lesson

topic.description: Topic ID or "current" for current topic

student.description: Student ID or "current" who has quiz started

all_quizzes.description: Whether to return all quizzes(eg. for a Course ID to return all Course, Lessons and Topics quizzes

has_prerequisite.description: Whether the Quiz has prerequisite, true/false

has_certificate.description: Whether the Quiz has certificate, true/false
